name: openrouter-simple-usage
description: A minimal VS Code extension to show remaining OpenRouter credits in the status bar

openrouterSimpleUsage.apiKey.markdownDescription: Your OpenRouter API key (sk-or-v1-...). Stored in plain text. Alternatively set the OPENROUTER_SIMPLE_USAGE_API_KEY environment variable.

openrouterSimpleUsage.refreshIntervalMin.markdownDescription: Minutes between automatic refreshes of OpenRouter simple usage. Set to 0 to disable auto refresh.
